Text:
Missing "The Snowmen."

Yes, I know it's a Christmas special and not on either the Part One or Two box sets, but it aired and takes place between 7x05 and 7x06, and is integral to the plot of S7 Part Two.

@TabascoQuesadilla There is nothing missing here. This is a rip of the Series Seven, Part Two BluRay. "The Snowmen" was released on a seperate BluRay. If you feel it should be on this disc then send your complaints to the BBC, not BOZX.
